attributes.action: Save Universal Yoga, our local yoga, wellness and community centre
attributes.additional_details:
We would like our yoga and wellness centre to remain open, it is a beacon of health and support in a small rural community, where several teachers of excellent calibre have come together for the well being of others.

It also serves several local schools in the area with yoga and well being support, both in primary and secondary schools. It also works together with the
Local GP practise in supporting healing from cancer, ME, depression and other debilitating illnesses.

It is threatened with closure because of parking issues, to which we have several solutions.
